alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morehouse, west central East Carroll, northeastern Richland and West Carroll Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Rayville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodwill around 250 PM CDT. Oak Grove around 305 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Forest, Pioneer, Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
